name: Hampton Inn & Suites Palmdale

reviews.text: We just returned from a weekend stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites in Palmdale. We were there with a group for a soccer tournament. (April 22 & 23, 2006).
reviews.title: Impressed with Hampton Inn & Suites - Palmdale

reviews.text: I was impressed with the hotel. For the price, I feel that we more than got our money's worth.
reviews.title: Hampton Inn is alright with me

aka: Hampton Inn & Suites Palmdale Hotel Palmdale
